file_insights.description: SQLAlchemy models for process management workflow

patterns_discovered: UUID primary keys for all models
Timestamp tracking for creation and updates
Flexible condition and configuration columns using JSONB
gotchas_discovered: Large number of models with complex relationships
Extensive use of nullable and optional fields
Complex conditional logic in flow and prompt models
Potential performance overhead from JSONB columns
recommendations: Create comprehensive documentation for model relationships
Implement thorough validation for conditional logic
Add performance testing for models with complex JSONB configurations
Review indexing strategy for large datasets
